description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPFactory Free Shipping Bar: Amount Left for Free Shipping for WooCommerce amount-left-free-shipping-woocommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Free Shipping Bar: Amount Left for Free Shipping for WooCommerce: from n/a through <= 2.4.9.
